name: Minions of the Necromancer
description:
You dive down into a dungeon to face the foul necromancer and it's minions, but beware, because death is only the beginning.

Game for the Gamedev.tv game jam may 2022.

Code for the game:

https://github.com/zenndahl/GameDev.tv-Jam

*Got sick at the last half of the jam (i'm still sick ;-;) and couldn't make everything working properly in time and it's very buggy and i'm sorry for that. I hope you guys at least have some laughs.
